#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<vector>
#include<stack>
#include<queue>
#include<cmath>
#include<algorithm>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    // freopen("input.txt", "r", stdin);
	int N;
	cin >> N;
	string S;
	cin >> S;
	double A, F;
	cin >> A >> F;
	double C;
	int flag = 1;
	for(int i = 0 ; i< N ;i++)
	{
		if(S[i] == 'L' )
		C += A;
		else
		C -= A;
		if(C >= F || C<= -F)
		{
			flag = 0; 
			break;
		}	
	}
	if(flag)
	cout << "YES\n";
	else
	cout << "NO\n";
}
